oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Old McDonald's Farm Review - 1952-09-19 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program Old McDonald's Farm Review. Originally broadcast 1952-09-19 at 7:00 pm, part 2. Personnel include Tom Hanserd (announcer), Grant Turner (host, filling in for John McDonald), Milton Estes (MC), Owen Bradley (conductor) and the Farm Review Band (performer) including Jack Gregory, Ray Price (performer), Moon Mullican (performer), and Jerry Rivers (performer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Owen Bradley; Farm Review Band; Ray Price; Jerry Rivers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Farm market report and weather (Grant Turner) -- Milton Estes introduces Ray Price -- Won't You Please Be Mine (Ray Price) -- Milton Estes introduces Owen Bradley and the Farm Review Band -- Doodle De Doo (Owen Bradley and the Farm Review Band) -- John McDonald farm report (recording) -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] (Milton Estes calls, Jerry Rivers fiddle) -- Milton Estes talks -- There Is Power In The Blood (Milton Estes, audience) -- Closing statement (Grant Turner) -- Theme (Owen Bradley and the Farm Review Band) -- Closing statement (Milton Estes)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Old McDonald's farm review (Radio program); National Life & Accident Insurance Company, Inc. (Nashville, Tenn.); Hanserd, Tom; Turner, Grant; Estes, Milton, 1914-1963; Bradley, Owen; Farm Review Band (Musical group); Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Gregory, Jack (Musician); Rivers, Jerry, 1928-
